text.tspan: How to determine a shard key
Chunks of docs sharing the same value will get bigger and cannot be sharded
Cardinality : how many documents map to a shard key value ? If too many docs match,
Cannot make targeted queries for range queries
Index locality : Do contiguous keys in an index are located in the same shard ? If not,
(avoid sature network with useless traffic) ? Ex key=country
Shard split by continent, a query to get docs for a country routes to 1 shard
Targeted queries : do regular access patterns result in
queries that can be routed to only
Write distributed among shards ? Ex if using an incremental ID and shards store a
Range of values then a single shard will get all the writes
Balanced Writes : when writing a sequence of documents with contiguous key values are
loosing a shard will only impact a subset of customers
Shard failure impact : if a shard goes down who is impacted ? Ex in 1A shards contains a
